item.title: Noisy Thames water man hole cover, 4th November
item.description:
This noisy cover clunks every minute or so when a car goes over it., I’ve reported it twice already to Thames water. Someone came and put nails around it which made no difference. First reported over a year ago.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Ossian Road, Stroud Green, London

item.title: Fly tipping on Boord Street, 4th November
item.description:
I reported suspicious behaviour on Monday November 3rd at 18:10, as some people with flashlights were waiting around on the inside of a locked gate of an empty lot. I suspected potential fly tipping. Now that I pass the lot again 24 hours later, the entire lot is filled piles of rubbish and an abandoned camping trailer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Boord Street, Greenwich Peninsula, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive speeding, 4th November
item.description:
Hello, I’ve had enough of vehicles speeding past my house on Flamstead End Road at ridiculously dangerous speeds and causing high levels of disruptive noise pollution from modified exhausts and engines. This road has become increasingly more busy and people treat it like a race track when in fact it’s heavily residential with shops and pedestrians using the road often. I take my kids to school daily and I’m so afraid of how fast vehicles travel through here. Please consider measures to reduce speeds (some in excess of 40mph) through our neighbourhood. Speed bumps, cameras or another set of traffic lights please, before someone is killed!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Flamstead End Road, Broxbourne
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree has broken branches hanging, 4th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rutland Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytipping, 4th November

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Road, Stockwell, London

item.title: Dog waste by lamppost on Merrow Street, 4th November
item.description:
Dog waste has been left by the lamppost in front of 9 Balmoral Court, on Merrow Street. I reported this a couple days ago but it's still there. There are several young kids on the street including my own so it would be good to clear it up for their safety. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merrow Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
